Tejal,

I try to distinguish between Unit tests and Integration tests.  I t=
ry to avoid testing my units on an application server.  I believe that test=
ing units in isolation is the best approach, i.e. my tests should independe=
nt from resources like databases, application server, etc. as much as possi=
ble.

I think there are frameworks that support testing on an application s=
erver, but I think this is something to avoid because it makes the automati=
on of tests for a build system very fragile.

Andreas
